EmailTemplate.description: Cancellation email that goes out to the Attendee when they cancel their registration.
EmailTemplate.name: Cancellation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Cancelled registration for {!conference360__Attendee__c.conference360__Event_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!conference360__Attendee__c.conference360__First_Name__c},
Your registration for {!conference360__Attendee__c.conference360__Event_Name__c} has been successfully cancelled.
Thank you!
